## FilterConfig interface

Configuration for a filter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FilterConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [collapsible?](./answers-react-components.filterconfig.collapsible.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Allow expanding and collapsing the group of filters. Defaults to true. |
|  [defaultExpanded?](./answers-react-components.filterconfig.defaultexpanded.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether or not the group of filters should be expanded on initial page load. Defaults to true. |
|  [label?](./answers-react-components.filterconfig.label.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Label for the filter group. |
|  [options](./answers-react-components.filterconfig.options.md) | FilterOption\[\] | Options to display together in a group. |
|  [placeholderText?](./answers-react-components.filterconfig.placeholdertext.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The placeholder text used for the filter option search input |
|  [searchable?](./answers-react-components.filterconfig.searchable.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether or not to display the filter option search input. |
